pages.text: $(li)The Ruined Citadel is an old structure that can be found over the End.$(br)$(li)This structure is made up of multiple layers, where there are hidden treasures.$(br)$(li)It is infested with $(l:patchouli:creatures/cataclysm/endermaptera)Endermapteras$(/l), and you will find various $(l:patchouli:bosses/ender_golem)Ender Golems$(/l) as you explore this place too.
$(li)Deep within this place, lies the $(l:patchouli:bosses/ender_guardian)Ender Guardian$(/l) prepared to annihilate any intruder that approaches it.
